subject: Haptic Motors for Simsonn pro
description_text:
Hello!

I have the Simsonn pro pedal set, is it possible to get the simsonn pro 
x or plus x controllerbox for this pedals and run them to adapt the 
haptic VAM system on them?
My controller box dont have plugs for the haptic motors.

King regards
Jürgen Mitterdorfer

conversations.body_text: Hi Jürgen Mitterdorfer,  Yes, you’ll need to purchase the PlusX control box, a dedicated 24V power supply, and either the VAM or VAM Pro motor, as the older versions of the control box were not designed with motor support interfaces.      https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor
